scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c && cp build/foundation.js ./examples
scripts.dev: run-when-changed --watch "src/*.js" --exec "rollup -c && cp build/foundation.js examples/foundation.js " & browser-sync start --server --files "examples/**/*" "build/*.*"
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/foundation.js -c -m -o build/foundation.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/foundation.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/foundation.js build/foundation.min.js
